job_description.job_summary:
We are seeking proactive and accurate candidates with strong work ethic, total attention to detail and the ability to work at a sustained high level of performance to join our Royalty processing team. 
Prior data entry, data matching or admin experience is desirable.

We are currently looking for:

A Processing Assistant to help process the data received from collection societies/sources.
This is an office-based role that will require a hardworking, detail-oriented and organized individual as well as a candidate who will be motivated by achieving a high work volume each day and taking pride in accurate work.
job_description.background: One of the key tasks of our Department is to process the data received from collection societies/sub-publishers as a result of the exploitation of songs, ready for Kobalt to distribute the royalties collected which are due to the copyright owners (the Kobalt clients).

duties: To process all royalty data including royalty allocation
You may be asked to take on extra responsibilities – please be aware that the above list is not exhaustive
